name: The Dark Prince
storyline: Upon the untimely passing of the late daemon king, Prince Drakon will take the Crown and reign over all six kingdoms. The prince's first task is to wed the fae princess of Tarafin, but the unification of a daemon and a fae is as unnatural as milk in mead; what could the Dark Prince possibly want with her?
summary: The Dark Prince is a fantasy romance visual novel about an arranged marriage between a daemon prince and a fae princess. Play as Princess Euphymia Tarafin on a quest to revive her lost magic and save her kingdom from the wrath of the daemons. The story features political tension and enemies-to-lovers romance.
